original_text: For Herod himself had given orders to have John arrested, and he had him bound and put in prison. He did this because of Herodias, his brother Philip’s wife, whom he had married.
korean_text: 전에 헤롯이 자기가 동생 빌립의 아내 헤로디아에게 장가 든 고로 이 여자를 위하여 사람을 보내어 요한을 잡아 옥에 가두었으니

sentences.original_text: For Herod himself had given orders
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 헤롯 자신이 명령을 내렸기 때문이며

sentences.original_text: He did this because of Herodias
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이렇게 한 것은 헤로디아 때문이었다
